description: This header file declares exported API functions for the Slap Object Wrapper (SlapOwo) in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) module. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, initializing, and resetting the object wrapper, and is part of the implementation for the BroadWay Service Delivery System.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjWrapper
methods.description: Creates an object wrapper with the provided container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: SlapOwoCreate
methods.description: Instantiates an Slap Object Wrapper object with given contexts.

methods.name: SlapOwoRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the specified Slap Object Wrapper instance.

methods.name: SlapOwoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrols necessary objects into the specified Slap Object Wrapper instance.

methods.name: SlapOwoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the specified Slap Object Wrapper instance.

methods.name: SlapOwoReset
methods.description: Resets the state of the specified Slap Object Wrapper instance.
